titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to enhance competition in the financial services industry by providing a prudential framework for the affiliation of banks, securities firms, and other financial service providers, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-474, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 10 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in part 1 of the report accompanying this resolution. No amendment to the substitute shall be in order except those printed in part 2 of the report accompanying this resolution, if offered in the order and manner specified.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 165.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Solomon withdrew the resolution from consideration.
Mr. Solomon asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 403 be laid upon the Table. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/31/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 10 (financial services industry affiliation).
